_classes_comment: Use either `gen_all_classes` or `class_names`. If `gen_all_classes` is selected, an audio per class is generated
_cond_audio_comment: Use either `same_class_conditioning` or `target_audio_path`.  When `same_class_conditioning` is selected, a random audio from the evaluation folder is used to condition the audio generation
_cond_scale_comment: How much the temporal conditioning is weighted on a (int) scale from 0 to 3 (3 is the maximum conditioning).
_stereo_comment: Output stereo audio (left: target / right: generated).
